newsitem.title: UK: BP Chemicals investing 35 mln stg in Scotland.
newsitem.headline: BP Chemicals investing 35 mln stg in Scotland.

text.p: BP Chemicals, a division of British Petroleum Plc, on Wednesday announced a 35 million stg project to expand capacity of its G4 ethylene cracker plant at Grangemouth in Scotland.
The investment will increase capacity by 50,000 tonnes to 320,000 tonnes. Work starts immediately and will take 17 months, creating 150 jobs at its peak, the company said in a statement.
